item.title: 肯尼亚连续第六次下调关键利率以促进经济发展
item.description: 肯尼亚中央银行连续第六次下调基准利率，在通胀保持良好的情况下帮助支撑经济。【原文：Kenya’s central bank cut its benchmark interest rate for the sixth time in a row to help shore up the economy as inflation remained benign.】

item.title: 交易员关注中美贸易谈判，美国股市震荡走高
item.description: 美国股市周二悄然走高，因为美国和中国在伦敦恢复了第二天的关税谈判，世界上两个最大的经济体正试图避免正在进行的贸易战进一步升级，金融市场岌岌可危。【原文：US stocks crept higher on Tuesday as the US and China resumed their tariff talks for a second day in London, with financial markets on edge as the world’s two largest economies try to avoid escalating the ongoing trade war further.】

item.title: 武契奇表示，欧洲央行甚至可以等到 9 月份再讨论下一次利率举措
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）认为，欧洲中央银行至少应等到 9 月份再深入讨论利率举措。【原文：The European Central Bank should wait until at least September to have an in-depth discussion about an interest-rate move, according to Governing Council member Boris Vujcic.】

item.title: 菲律宾参议院投票决定将杜特尔特弹劾案退回众议院
item.description: 周二晚些时候，参议院投票决定将弹劾条款退回众议院，以确保这些条款不违反宪法，这使得参议院审判菲律宾副总统萨拉-杜特尔特的前景成疑。【原文：Prospects for a Senate trial of Philippine Vice President Sara Duterte were thrown into doubt late Tuesday, after the Senate voted to return the articles of impeachment to the House to ensure they aren’t in breach of the constitution.】

item.title: 世界银行警告 2020 年代将面临自 20 世纪 60 年代以来最弱的全球增长
item.description: 世界银行周二下调了对今年全球经济增长的预测，并警告说，由于贸易紧张局势和政策不确定性，2020 年的经济表现将是自阿波罗首次登月以来最弱的十年。【原文：The World Bank on Tuesday cut its forecast for global growth this year and warned that the 2020s are on track for the weakest performance for any decade since the first Apollo moon landing because of trade tensions and policy uncertainty.】

item.title: 通货紧缩交易使贝塔玻璃成为尼日利亚交易所的赢家
item.description: 尼日利亚的生活成本危机帮助包装公司 Beta Glass Plc 成为尼日利亚证券交易所表现最好的股票，因为公司选择多种产品规模来管理较高的成本。【原文：Nigeria’s cost-of-living crisis has helped make packaging company Beta Glass Plc the best performing equity on the Nigerian Stock Exchange, as companies opt for multiple product sizes to manage higher costs.】

item.title: 土耳其银行股因降息预期接近三个月高点
item.description: 土耳其央行通过更低廉的一周回购利率提供更多资金后，土耳其银行股周二反弹，市场认为此举表明降息可能即将到来。【原文：Turkish bank shares rallied on Tuesday after the central bank provided more funding through its cheaper one-week repo rate, a move seen by markets as a sign that interest-rate cuts could be on the horizon.】

item.title: 欧盟建议将石油价格上限降至 45 美元，打击俄罗斯收入
item.description: 欧盟提议禁止北溪管道，并将七国集团石油价格上限降至 45 美元，作为新制裁方案的一部分，目的是加大对莫斯科的压力，迫使其结束对乌克兰的战争。【原文：The European Union proposed banning the Nord Stream pipelines and cutting the Group of Seven oil price cap to $45 as part of a new sanctions package that aims to increase pressure on Moscow to end its war against Ukraine.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"新一轮考验：哈萨克斯坦石油出口将再次接近历史最高水平
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦的原油出口量将在下个月再次接近创纪录水平，这凸显了这个中亚国家不断增长的供应量对欧佩克+构成的持续挑战。【原文：Kazakhstan’s crude oil exports are set to hold near record levels again next month, highlighting the ongoing challenge the central Asian country’s burgeoning supply is posing for OPEC+.】

item.title: Brown & 布朗公司将以 98 亿美元收购 Accession 风险管理公司
item.description: 布朗公司同意以 98 亿美元收购 Accession 风险管理集团公司，这是该公司有史以来最大的一笔收购。【原文：Brown & Brown Inc. agreed to buy Accession Risk Management Group Inc. for $9.8 billion, its largest-ever acquisition.】

item.title: 越来越多的加拿大人放弃美国公路旅行，年降幅达 38
item.description: 从加拿大前往美国的跨境公路旅行人数连续第五个月下降，许多美国度假胜地在夏季旅游旺季一度成为北方邻国的常去之地，前景黯淡。【原文：Cross-border road trips to the US from Canada fell for a fifth straight month, a gloomy outlook for many American vacation spots once frequented by their northern neighbors during the peak summer travel season.】

item.title: Pimco 青睐 5 至 10 年期债券，对私人信贷持谨慎态度
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co., Ltd.）预计，在未来半个世纪内，该公司将偏爱5至10年到期的全球债券，并减持长期债券，同时在私人信贷领域谨慎行事，因为增长疲软会威胁到低质量公司。【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co. expects to favor global bonds due in 5 to 10 years and be underweight long-maturity debt over the next half-decade, while treading carefully in private credit as weaker growth threatens lower-quality companies, according to the $2 trillion asset manager’s latest annual secular outlook.】

item.title: 麦当劳股价暴跌，GLP-1 风险引发罕见卖出评级
item.description: 麦当劳公司（McDonald's Corp. ）周二股价暴跌，此前 Redburn Atlantic 公司对这家汉堡连锁店给予了唯一的卖出评级，称减肥药和通货膨胀导致的消费模式转变令人担忧。【原文：McDonald’s Corp. shares slumped on Tuesday after Redburn Atlantic slapped the burger chain with its sole sell rating, saying shifting consumer patterns due to weight-loss drugs and inflation are cause for concern.】

item.title: 派拉蒙全球公司因有线电视业衰退将裁减 3.5% 的美国员工
item.description: 由于有线电视行业的持续衰退和经济大环境的影响，派拉蒙全球公司计划于本周二裁员数百人。【原文：Paramount Global plans to cut several hundred employees on Tuesday due to a continuing decline in the cable-TV industry and the broader economic landscape.】

item.title: 亚洲私募股权投资者希望以 40% 的折扣提高回报率
item.description: 据资产管理公司 Ardian SAS 称，亚洲的富裕投资者正着眼于以高达 40% 的折扣在二级市场购买私募股权资产，以提高回报率。【原文：Asia’s wealthy investors are eyeing discounts of up to 40% to buy private equity assets in the secondary market as they seek to boost returns, according to asset manager Ardian SAS.】

item.title: 巴西通胀放缓，市场对 6 月利率会议看法不一

item.description: 古根海姆财资服务公司（Guggenheim Treasury Services）在成功推出首款与数字分类账挂钩的债务产品后，又与加密货币公司瑞波（Ripple）合作扩大了该产品的范围。【原文：After a successful rollout of its first digital ledger-linked debt offering, Guggenheim Treasury Services is expanding the product in a tie-up with crypto firm Ripple.】

item.title: 近期糖价下跌吸引买家，白糖涨势扩大
item.description: 原糖连续第二天攀升，原因是市场乐观地认为近期的下跌将吸引买家，而且原油价格走强可能促使糖厂将更多甘蔗转用于生产乙醇。【原文：Raw sugar climbed for a second day on optimism that recent declines would draw in buyers and stronger crude prices may prompt mills to divert more cane to make ethanol.】

item.title: 据称 Blackstone 将酝酿在未来几周内启动 Cirsa IPO
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 正考虑在未来几周内启动西班牙赌场运营商 Cirsa Enterprises 的首次公开募股，因为波动性的减弱为公司在夏季淡季前上市打开了一扇窗。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is considering launching an initial public offering of Spanish casino operator Cirsa Enterprises as soon as the coming weeks, according to people familiar with the matter, as fading volatility has opened a window for companies to go public before the summer lull.】

item.title: CoreWeave 和 Palantir 因股价飙升而成为 "备忘录股票 "的对比对象
item.description: CoreWeave Inc.和 Palantir Technologies Inc.的股价飙升，让人们将其与 "备忘录股"（meme stocks）相提并论；这些股票的快速上涨是由散户交易者的狂热而非财务业绩推动的。【原文：The surging shares of CoreWeave Inc. and Palantir Technologies Inc. are drawing comparisons to meme stocks — whose rapid gains are fueled by retail trader fervor more than financial performance.】

item.title: 新加坡与马来西亚亿万富翁国王的儿子交换优质土地
item.description: 新加坡政府正在将其最昂贵的住宅飞地之一的一块土地转让给马来西亚亿万富翁国王的长子，以换取其家族拥有了一个多世纪的一块更大的空地。【原文：Singapore’s government is transferring a plot of land in one of its priciest residential enclaves to the eldest son of Malaysia’s billionaire king, in exchange for a larger vacant parcel that his family has owned for more than a century.】

item.title: 英国有史以来最大彩票奖可能在周二开出
item.description: 在周五的欧洲百万彩票开奖没有中奖之后，英国有史以来最大的彩票奖可能会在周二产生。【原文：The biggest lottery prize the UK has ever seen could be won on Tuesday after Friday's EuroMillions draw had no winners.】

item.title: 洲际酒店集团首席执行官表示，旅游 "反弹 "预示着夏季的良好前景
item.description: 洲际酒店集团（InterContinental Hotels Group Plc）首席执行官埃利-马鲁夫（Elie Maalouf）表示，尽管全球紧张局势加剧，但最近从欧洲到美国的旅游 "反弹 "对酒店业来说是个好兆头。【原文：InterContinental Hotels Group Plc Chief Executive Officer Elie Maalouf said a recent “bounceback” in travel from Europe to the US bodes well for the hotelier even as global tensions surge.】

item.title: 抵押贷款机构 Better 聘用前美国联邦住房管理局金融科技主管领导人工智能平台

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构正在研究私人市场数据
item.description: 澳大利亚的企业监管部门正在仔细检查私人信贷数据，在该国 4.2 万亿澳元（2.7 万亿美元）养老金行业的推动下，私人信贷出现了强劲增长。【原文：Australia’s corporate watchdog is scrutinizing data on private credit that has seen strong growth driven by the country’s A$4.2 trillion ($2.7 trillion) pensions sector.】
